
file(GLOB_RECURSE JSON_SOURCE_FILES src/*.cpp include/*.cpp)
file(GLOB_RECURSE JSON_SOURCE_HEADER_FILES src/*.h include/*.h)

set(APP_SOURCE_FILES ${APP_SOURCE_FILES} ${JSON_SOURCE_FILES} PARENT_SCOPE)
set(APP_SOURCE_HEADER_FILES ${APP_SOURCE_HEADER_FILES} ${JSON_SOURCE_HEADER_FILES} PARENT_SCOPE)
